xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/1038709-Arise: The Sri Lankan Metal Music Documentary 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/Ai2EiL96S69PxehpQlIz5u7XVsz.jpg A documentary film that takes a deeper look at the lives of four-underground metal bands in Sri Lanka. The documentary explores the life and difficulties faced by these musicians and presents a story from their point of view. Arise: The Sri Lankan Metal Music Documentary
